amendment.description: To propose a technical amendment relating to Senate pay periods.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4712 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4712 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S3837; text: CR S3837) To propose a technical amendment relating to Senate pay periods.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4712 proposed by Senator Reid.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4712 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
